subject: Re: New files
author: Misty
full_text:
I think they are always in the apartment with you (or anywhere else 
they choose to be) and that the radio or any other method is just a 
tool we/they use/modulate for sound.

=)
Misty


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "reesclarke_69" <reesclarke_69@...> 
wrote:
>
> I have some new Files that I'm going to post, but I want you to pay 
> attention to one file called "rUherewithUs"  I ask the question and 
at 
> the very end I hear an answer that didn't sound like it came from the 
> 12-469.  It said "No" under a breath.  I don't think it was from the 
> radio, but in the Apt with me.  What do you think?
> 
> Thanks 
> 
> Rees
>
